text: Khipro (, ) is a taluka, an administrative subdivision, of Sanghar District, Sindh, Pakistan.Also known as the capital of the white desert,gateway to white desert.Khipro have a lake which is known as botar lake which is covered by lotus. Khipro also make remarkable contribution in salt production. Its fast growing city through recent years it has gone through developing impact and going on. Category:Tehsils of Sanghar District
title: Khipro Tehsil
